alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goodhue County through 845 PM CDT... At 759 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Wanamingo, or 15 miles east of Northfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodhue around 810 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Frontenac. This includes U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 82 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
